title: Midwest Farmers Rush To Dispose Of Chickens Killed To Contain Avian Flu
teaser: The USDA says 38 million chickens must be killed to stop the spread of one of the worst outbreaks of avian flu in North America. Northwest Iowa officials are scrambling to dispose of the dead birds.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
